md.html:
That which is significantly beneficial to the flourishing of a person (in terms of growth and actualization).

  • Engagement
  • Accomplishment
  • Contribution
  • Autonomy
  • Grit

Potential additions:

  • Vitality (energy, liveliness)
  • Novelty (spontaneity, variety)
  • Character (virtue, wisdom)

fm.title: Fundamentals of flourishing
fm.description: Fundamentals of flourishing outline which is significantly beneficial to the flourishing of a person (in terms of growth and actualization).
fm.keywords: fundamentals, growth, actualization, engagement, accomplishment, contribution, autonomy, grit
